description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任宁夏回族自治区政协副主席，第九届全国政协委员。2000年被开除中国共产党党籍。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former Vice Chairman of the CPPCC Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region Committee, and a member of the 9th National Committee of the CPPCC. He was expelled from the Chinese Communist Party in 2000.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议宁夏回族自治区委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议宁夏回族自治区委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在宁夏回族自治区的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in the Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第九届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第九届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的第九届全国委员会，于1998年3月至2003年3月期间履行职能。
description.en: The 9th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, which served from March 1998 to March 2003.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 宁夏回族自治区人事劳动厅

zh-cn: 宁夏回族自治区人事劳动厅

description.zh-cn: 宁夏回族自治区负责管理劳动人事事务的政府部门。
description.en: The government department of the Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region responsible for personnel and labor affairs.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通常简称为“中国”。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as 'China'.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议宁夏回族自治区委员会

description.zh-cn: 周文吉曾担任宁夏回族自治区政协副主席。
description.en: Zhou Wenji once served as Vice Chairman of the CPPCC of Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第九届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 周文吉曾担任第九届全国政协委员。
description.en: Zhou Wenji served as a member of the 9th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 周文吉曾是中国共产党党员，于2000年被开除党籍。
description.en: Zhou Wenji was a member of the Chinese Communist Party and was expelled in 2000.

description.zh-cn: 2000年，周文吉被开除中国共产党党籍。
description.en: In 2000, Zhou Wenji was expelled from the Chinese Communist Party.

relationships.target: 宁夏回族自治区人事劳动厅

description.zh-cn: 根据其维基百科分类，周文吉曾任宁夏回族自治区人事劳动厅厅长。
description.en: According to his Wikipedia category, Zhou Wenji served as Director of the Department of Personnel and Labor of the Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region.
